name: Bird God (Evans Bohl)
description:
Play as the Bird God and switch between his multiple forms to defeat the darkness.

Survive 3 waves of enemies and kill the boss to win.

Gameplay Instructions (Gamepad is highly recommended):
- Keyboard and mouse (Only works with European AZERTY Keyboards) :
  - 1,2,and 3 to shapeshift between the 3 forms
  - Use the ZQSD keyboard's keys to move
  - Left mouse button for the Main action
  - Right mouse button for the secondary action
  - P to pause the game

- Gamepad:
  - a, b, and y to shapeshift between the 3 forms
  - Left stick to move
  - Right trigger for the main action
  - Left trigger for the secondary action
  - Start button to pause the game
